pages.text: $(#bd951a)Health:$()$(#ff0000)180$(br)$(#bd951a)Heal:$()$(#ff0000)1HP/5s$(br)$(#bd951a)Seed Recharge Time:$()$(#ff0000)50s$(br)$(#bd951a)Special:$()$(#ff0000)Zombies prefer to eat them. Blocks straight projectiles.$(br)$(#bd951a)"People wonder how I feel about getting constantly chewed on by zombies," says Wall-nut. "What they don't realize is that with my limited senses all I can feel is a kind of tingling, like a relaxing back rub."

pages.title: BLOOM & DOOM SEED CO.
pages.text: $(#25228d)Wall-nuts have hard shells which you can use to protect your other plants.
